summary: An ordinance authorizing and directing the City Treasurer to cancel the unpaid assessments levied for the improvement of 24th Avenue North, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by paving, Local Improvement District No. 3329, and 22nd Avenue North, and other streets and avenues, by concrete walks, Local Improvement District No. 2986, on a portion of Lot 6, Block 13, Plan of Union City Addition, deeded to the City of Seattle for street purposes.
